data.text: @Otimronnie1 @KagutaMuseveni @MbahoJoshua @kamukamafredie @Analyst_emma @nuwamanyaisaac @trill_ug @96Assurance @Ronaldsebutiko @twijukyeobed @NagiraPeace I agree with you. And I think there's a curriculum committee under the @Educ_SportsUg working on this aspect to address such concerns. The future will be better and that's what #Musevenomics is about.

@ugandan_patriot @KagutaMuseveni @MbahoJoshua @kamukamafredie @Analyst_emma @nuwamanyaisaac @trill_ug @96Assurance @Ronaldsebutiko @twijukyeobed @NagiraPeace We also need to deal with the poor quality education with alot of wasted years. Also what students learn is not helpful in the real market place today

@Otimronnie1 @KagutaMuseveni @MbahoJoshua @kamukamafredie @Analyst_emma @nuwamanyaisaac @trill_ug @96Assurance @Ronaldsebutiko @twijukyeobed @NagiraPeace You are right. I believe the growth of private sector will hugely sort out this job crisis issue. We also need to focus more on job creation than job seeking. 
#Musevenomics

@ugandan_patriot @KagutaMuseveni @MbahoJoshua @kamukamafredie @Analyst_emma @nuwamanyaisaac @trill_ug @96Assurance @Ronaldsebutiko @twijukyeobed @NagiraPeace To keep up with growth in the labor force, the economy needs to create at least 700,000 jobs per year, which far exceeds the 75,000 jobs that are currently created each year
